premission package¶

premission.checker module¶

– for use in endpoints and interact with permission interfaces with no service interference

class premission.checker.PermissionChecker(p: premission.interface.IPermission)¶

Bases: object

check(request: starlette.requests.Request)¶

Function for call defined service check_access function

Args:
request (Request): request

premission.interface module¶

– for use in services and call in checker class

class premission.interface.IPermission¶

Bases: abc.ABC

abstract check_access(request: starlette.requests.Request)¶

Function for check permission access (every driven class must impeliment)

Args:
request (Request): request for get user information
Raises:
NotImplementedError: if the driven class didn’t implement the function

premission.services module¶

for various permissions and inherit from IPermission to use its functions

– if you want to add new permission role:
add your class there and implement IPermission functions like others
class premission.services.UserAuthenticated¶

Bases: premission.interface.IPermission

Bases: premission.interface.IPermission

Module contents¶

  • For add new permission:
    Add your specific permission class in the service.py file add inherit it from the IPermission interface.
  • For use permission:
    Create new object of PermissionChecker in checker.py and pass the new object of permission service to class __init__ then call check function for fastapi depends in router.

Example:

dependencies = [Depends(PermissionChecker(UserAuthenticated()).check)]
